title: Is class 12th and undergraduate the same thing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nope. Higher secondary is 12th where you have combinations to choose like PCMB,PCME,PCMC etc., Undergraduate is where you are supposed to learn application part of it with more solid proof and backing like Engineering. Which is not happening BTW.
Yes students who passed class 12th and not completed their graduation yet called under graduate.
